title: Mexico : age distribution of internet users 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of respondents. In total the number of data points it has is 7.
Overall Share of respondents has decreased over the Year.

Share of respondents is slightly increasing from 12-17_years to 18-24_years, slightly decreasing from 18-24_years to 35-44_years, roughly constant from 35-44_years to 6-11_years, and lastly slightly decreasing from 6-11_years to Over_55_years.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 25-34_years and 35-44_years.
Maximum Share of respondents, about 22.0 was reported at Year 25-34_years
Minimum Share of respondents about 8.0 was reached at Year Over_55_years
